name: Sausage Sizzle Simulator
description:
It's a classic, the hardware store sausage sizzle. Australians from far and wide come to overpay  for half burnt sausages with an assortment of toppings and sauces.

Your job is to make sausage sandwiches for customers as they arrive. Be careful, if you don't satisfy them things will start to escalate quickly!

One part  cooking simulator, one part exploration of an Australian tradition. Sausage Sizzle Simulator has got your Sunday sausage requirements sorted.

What on earth is a sausage sizzle?

The height of Australian culture: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sausage_sizzle

Controls:

[W][A][S][D] - Movement

[E] - Interact

Tips & Tricks:

A sandwich must start and finish with bread.

If you put the wrong sauce on a sandwich, you'll have to throw it all away.

The faster you serve customers, the less they'll complain.
